blocks.name: cghomOLD
blocks.content: Obsolete version of ~ cghm as of 15-Mar-2020. Extend class notation to include the class of group homomorphisms. (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: df-ghomOLD
blocks.content: Obsolete version of ~ df-ghm as of 15-Mar-2020. Define the set of group homomorphisms from ` g ` to ` h ` . (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 25-Feb-2008.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-ghomOLD(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  |- wceq(cghomOLD, cmpo(s0, s1, cgr, cgr, cab(s2, wa(wf(cv(s2), crn(cv(s0)), crn(cv(s1))), wral(s3, crn(cv(s0)), wral(s4, crn(cv(s0)), wceq(co(cfv(cv(s2), cv(s3)), cv(s1), cfv(cv(s2), cv(s4))), cfv(cv(s2), co(cv(s3), cv(s0), cv(s4))))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-ghomOLD(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  ‚ä¢ GrpOpHom =(s0 ‚àà GrpOp, s1 ‚àà GrpOp ‚Ü¶ { s2 |((s2 : ran(s0)‚Üí ran(s1))‚àß ‚àÄ(s3 ‚àà ran(s0), ‚àÄ(s4 ‚àà ran(s0),((s2 ` s3)[s1](s2 ` s4))=(s2 `(s3[s0]s4)))))})
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s4)
}

thm elghomlem1OLD(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, cgr)), wceq(co(c0, cghomOLD, c1), c2))
  -| wceq(c2, cab(s0, wa(wf(cv(s0), crn(c0), crn(c1)), wral(s1, crn(c0), wral(s2, crn(c0), wceq(co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1, cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2))), cfv(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2)))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
} = {
  mpd3an3(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, cgr), wceq(co(c0, cghomOLD, c1), c2), wcel(c2, universe))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, cgr), wcel(c2, universe), wcel(crn(c0), universe), wcel(crn(c1), universe))
  rnexg(c0, cgr)
  rnexg(c1, cgr)
  fabexg(s0, crn(c0), universe, crn(c1), universe, c2, wral(s1, crn(c0), wral(s2, crn(c0), wceq(co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1, cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2))), cfv(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2)))))))
  ovmpt2g(hs0, hs1, c0, cgr, c1, cgr, c2, universe, cghomOLD, cab(s0, wa(wf(cv(s0), crn(cv(hs0)), crn(cv(hs1))), wral(s1, crn(cv(hs0)), wral(s2, crn(cv(hs0)), wceq(co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(hs1), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2))), cfv(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s2)))))))), cab(s0, wa(wf(cv(s0), crn(c0), crn(cv(hs1))), wral(s1, crn(c0), wral(s2, crn(c0), wceq(co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(hs1), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2))), cfv(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2)))))))))
  abbidv(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wf(cv(s0), crn(cv(hs0)), crn(cv(hs1))), wral(s1, crn(cv(hs0)), wral(s2, crn(cv(hs0)), wceq(co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(hs1), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2))), cfv(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s2))))))), wa(wf(cv(s0), crn(c0), crn(cv(hs1))), wral(s1, crn(c0), wral(s2, crn(c0), wceq(co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(hs1), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2))), cfv(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))))))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wf(cv(s0), crn(cv(hs0)), crn(cv(hs1))), wral(s1, crn(cv(hs0)), wral(s2, crn(cv(hs0)), wceq(co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(hs1), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2))), cfv(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s2)))))), wf(cv(s0), crn(c0), crn(cv(hs1))), wral(s1, crn(c0), wral(s2, crn(c0), wceq(co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(hs1), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2))), cfv(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2)))))))
  feq2d(cv(s0), crn(cv(hs0)), crn(cv(hs1)), crn(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  raleqbidv(s1, crn(cv(hs0)), crn(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wral(s2, crn(cv(hs0)), wceq(co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(hs1), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2))), cfv(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s2))))), wral(s2, crn(c0), wceq(co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(hs1), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2))), cfv(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))))))
  raleqbidv(s2, crn(cv(hs0)), crn(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(hs1), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2))), cfv(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s2)))), wceq(co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(hs1), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2))), cfv(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2)))))
  rneq(cv(hs0), c0)
  eqeq2d(co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(hs1), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2))), cfv(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s2))), cfv(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2d(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s2)), co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s1), cv(s2))
  syl6eqr(cab(s0, wa(wf(cv(s0), crn(c0), crn(cv(hs1))), wral(s1, crn(c0), wral(s2, crn(c0), wceq(co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(hs1), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2))), cfv(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2)))))))), c2, cab(s0, wa(wf(cv(s0), crn(c0), crn(c1)), wral(s1, crn(c0), wral(s2, crn(c0), wceq(co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1, cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2))), cfv(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2)))))))), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  abbidv(s0, wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wa(wf(cv(s0), crn(c0), crn(cv(hs1))), wral(s1, crn(c0), wral(s2, crn(c0), wceq(co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(hs1), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2))), cfv(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))))))), wa(wf(cv(s0), crn(c0), crn(c1)), wral(s1, crn(c0), wral(s2, crn(c0), wceq(co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1, cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2))), cfv(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))))))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wf(cv(s0), crn(c0), crn(cv(hs1))), wral(s1, crn(c0), wral(s2, crn(c0), wceq(co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(hs1), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2))), cfv(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2)))))), wf(cv(s0), crn(c0), crn(c1)), wral(s1, crn(c0), wral(s2, crn(c0), wceq(co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1, cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2))), cfv(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2)))))))
  feq3d(cv(s0), crn(c0), crn(cv(hs1)), crn(c1), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  rneq(cv(hs1), c1)
  2ralbidv(s1, s2, crn(c0), crn(c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(hs1), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2))), cfv(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2)))), wceq(co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1, cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2))), cfv(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2)))))
  eqeq1d(co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(hs1), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2))), cfv(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1, cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2))), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  oveq(cv(hs1), c1, cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)))
  df-ghomOLD(hs0, hs1, s0, s1, s2)
  diff.crn.s(s0, c0)
  diff.crn.s(s0, c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cgr)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cgr)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs1), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs1), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, cv(hs1), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.hs1.s(s2)
}

thm elghomlem1OLD(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà GrpOp ‚àß c1 ‚àà GrpOp)‚Üí(c0[GrpOpHom]c1)= c2)
  ‚ä£ c2 = { s0 |((s0 : ran(c0)‚Üí ran(c1))‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ran(c0), ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà ran(c0),((s0 ` s1)[c1](s0 ` s2))=(s0 `(s1[c0]s2)))))}
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c1)
} = {
  mpd3an3(c0 ‚àà GrpOp, c1 ‚àà GrpOp, (c0[GrpOpHom]c1)= c2, c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  syl2an(c0 ‚àà GrpOp, c1 ‚àà GrpOp, c2 ‚àà ùïå, ran(c0)‚àà ùïå, ran(c1)‚àà ùïå)
  rnexg(c0, cgr)
  rnexg(c1, cgr)
  fabexg(s0, ran(c0), universe, ran(c1), universe, c2, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ran(c0), ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà ran(c0),((s0 ` s1)[c1](s0 ` s2))=(s0 `(s1[c0]s2)))))
  ovmpt2g(hs0, hs1, c0, cgr, c1, cgr, c2, universe, cghomOLD, { s0 |((s0 : ran(hs0)‚Üí ran(hs1))‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ran(hs0), ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà ran(hs0),((s0 ` s1)[hs1](s0 ` s2))=(s0 `(s1[hs0]s2)))))}, { s0 |((s0 : ran(c0)‚Üí ran(hs1))‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ran(c0), ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà ran(c0),((s0 ` s1)[hs1](s0 ` s2))=(s0 `(s1[c0]s2)))))})
  abbidv(s0, hs0 = c0, ((s0 : ran(hs0)‚Üí ran(hs1))‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ran(hs0), ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà ran(hs0),((s0 ` s1)[hs1](s0 ` s2))=(s0 `(s1[hs0]s2))))), ((s0 : ran(c0)‚Üí ran(hs1))‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ran(c0), ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà ran(c0),((s0 ` s1)[hs1](s0 ` s2))=(s0 `(s1[c0]s2))))))
  anbi12d(hs0 = c0, (s0 : ran(hs0)‚Üí ran(hs1)), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ran(hs0), ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà ran(hs0),((s0 ` s1)[hs1](s0 ` s2))=(s0 `(s1[hs0]s2)))), (s0 : ran(c0)‚Üí ran(hs1)), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ran(c0), ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà ran(c0),((s0 ` s1)[hs1](s0 ` s2))=(s0 `(s1[c0]s2)))))
  feq2d(s0, ran(hs0), ran(hs1), ran(c0), hs0 = c0)
  raleqbidv(s1, ran(hs0), ran(c0), hs0 = c0, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà ran(hs0),((s0 ` s1)[hs1](s0 ` s2))=(s0 `(s1[hs0]s2))), ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà ran(c0),((s0 ` s1)[hs1](s0 ` s2))=(s0 `(s1[c0]s2))))
  raleqbidv(s2, ran(hs0), ran(c0), hs0 = c0, ((s0 ` s1)[hs1](s0 ` s2))=(s0 `(s1[hs0]s2)), ((s0 ` s1)[hs1](s0 ` s2))=(s0 `(s1[c0]s2)))
  rneq(hs0, c0)
  eqeq2d(((s0 ` s1)[hs1](s0 ` s2)), (s0 `(s1[hs0]s2)), (s0 `(s1[c0]s2)), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2d(s0, (s1[hs0]s2), (s1[c0]s2), hs0 = c0)
  oveq(hs0, c0, s1, s2)
  syl6eqr({ s0 |((s0 : ran(c0)‚Üí ran(hs1))‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ran(c0), ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà ran(c0),((s0 ` s1)[hs1](s0 ` s2))=(s0 `(s1[c0]s2)))))}, c2, { s0 |((s0 : ran(c0)‚Üí ran(c1))‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ran(c0), ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà ran(c0),((s0 ` s1)[c1](s0 ` s2))=(s0 `(s1[c0]s2)))))}, hs1 = c1)
  abbidv(s0, hs1 = c1, ((s0 : ran(c0)‚Üí ran(hs1))‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ran(c0), ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà ran(c0),((s0 ` s1)[hs1](s0 ` s2))=(s0 `(s1[c0]s2))))), ((s0 : ran(c0)‚Üí ran(c1))‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ran(c0), ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà ran(c0),((s0 ` s1)[c1](s0 ` s2))=(s0 `(s1[c0]s2))))))
  anbi12d(hs1 = c1, (s0 : ran(c0)‚Üí ran(hs1)), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ran(c0), ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà ran(c0),((s0 ` s1)[hs1](s0 ` s2))=(s0 `(s1[c0]s2)))), (s0 : ran(c0)‚Üí ran(c1)), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ran(c0), ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà ran(c0),((s0 ` s1)[c1](s0 ` s2))=(s0 `(s1[c0]s2)))))
  feq3d(s0, ran(c0), ran(hs1), ran(c1), hs1 = c1)
  rneq(hs1, c1)
  2ralbidv(s1, s2, ran(c0), ran(c0), hs1 = c1, ((s0 ` s1)[hs1](s0 ` s2))=(s0 `(s1[c0]s2)), ((s0 ` s1)[c1](s0 ` s2))=(s0 `(s1[c0]s2)))
  eqeq1d(((s0 ` s1)[hs1](s0 ` s2)), (s0 `(s1[c0]s2)), ((s0 ` s1)[c1](s0 ` s2)), hs1 = c1)
  oveq(hs1, c1, (s0 ` s1), (s0 ` s2))
  df-ghomOLD(hs0, hs1, s0, s1, s2)
  diff.crn.s(s0, c0)
  diff.crn.s(s0, c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)

  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)

thm elghomlem2OLD(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, cgr)), wb(wcel(c2, co(c0, cghomOLD, c1)), wa(wf(c2, crn(c0), crn(c1)), wral(s0, crn(c0), wral(s1, crn(c0), wceq(co(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c1, cfv(c2, cv(s1))), cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))))))))
  -| wceq(c3, cab(s2, wa(wf(cv(s2), crn(c0), crn(c1)), wral(s0, crn(c0), wral(s1, crn(c0), wceq(co(cfv(cv(s2), cv(s0)), c1, cfv(cv(s2), cv(s1))), cfv(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
} = {
  bitrd(wa(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, cgr)), wcel(c2, co(c0, cghomOLD, c1)), wa(wf(c2, crn(c0), crn(c1)), wral(s0, crn(c0), wral(s1, crn(c0), wceq(co(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c1, cfv(c2, cv(s1))), cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))))))), wcel(c2, c3))
  eleq2d(c2, co(c0, cghomOLD, c1), c3, wa(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, cgr)))
